QuestData.Title: The Temple of Elune
QuestData.Description: Cenarius is in danger.$b$bIf his condition is not reversed soon, he will be lost to the Nightmare that threatens the Emerald Dream. To spare him that fate, we must have the Tears of Elune - the same relic you were sent here to retrieve.$b$bElune's temple is not far. Go there. Find Lyanis. Show her my seal and instruct her to release the tears into your custody.$b$bHurry, $n. Time is short.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Lyanis Moonfall at the Temple of Elune.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Lyanis Moonfall at the Temple of Elune.
QuestData.RewardText: You - you bear the mark of The Dreamer. Elune be praised!$b$bYou've arrived just in time, visitor. Shaladrassil's roots are at our doorstep...
